title: Metagit Memory Hierarchy Standards
description: Rules for the transition from temporal session logs to permanent Heartwood legislative state.

values.name: Chrono-Fractal Depth
values.rule: Organize active work within temporal directories; migrate finished wisdom to root principles/.
values.rationale: Prevents context drift and maintains a clean monotonic trunk by separating 'Air' (Context) from 'Wood' (State).

values.name: Monotonic Growth
values.rule: The Heartwood only grows or hardens; logic is never overwritten, only versioned and archived.
values.rationale: Ensures absolute forensic accountability and prevents the loss of 'hard-won knowledge' across swarm generations.

values.name: Deferred Deletion
values.rule: Identify redundant artifacts and queue them for end-of-session purge via todo.json.
values.rationale: As proven by multiple OOM crashes, metabolic intent must be recorded in the 'Nerves' (JSON) to survive process failure.
